definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: So you don't have ductility, which is what you have in metal.
sentences.chinese: 所以材料不具備延展性，而且金屬中有自由電子。

sentences.english: It has a yellowish appearance and its malleability is dependent on how high the carat is.
sentences.chinese: 它有一個黃色的外觀，其延展性是克拉有多高依賴。

sentences.english: Good ductility of aluminum foil, can do a variety of styles of lunch boxes, beautiful and clear Cool.
sentences.chinese: 鋁箔延展性好，能做各種樣式的餐盒，美觀清爽。

sentences.english: Silver is the most malleable of all metals.
sentences.chinese: 銀是延展性最好的金屬。

sentences.english: It is malleable and designed to be changed.
sentences.chinese: 它具有延展性，並且設計爲可以變化的。

sentences.english: The malleable IP address gives your network some flexible manageability.
sentences.chinese: 具有延展性的IP地址讓你的網絡擁有了靈活的管理。

sentences.english: Stretching regularly will help maintain your flexibility and range of motion.
sentences.chinese: 伸展運動可以經常幫助你保持身體的柔韌性和延展性。

sentences.english: It is iron-gray and fairly soft and ductile.
sentences.chinese: 呈鐵灰色，柔軟性和延展性與錫相近。

sentences.english: The absorption of hydrogen by a metal resulting in a loss of ductility.
sentences.chinese: 金屬中吸收了氫的成分，金屬的延展性由此而減弱。

sentences.english: Once ductility is introduced, materials become weak.
sentences.chinese: 而一旦把延展性引入進來，材料就變得脆弱了。

sentences.english: Accessory cord is static, or very low stretch.
sentences.chinese: 輔繩通常是靜力繩，或者延展性非常小。
岩棉板使用中延展性很。

sentences.english: The ability of a metal to be drawn into a wire is known as ductility.
sentences.chinese: 金屬被拉成金屬絲的性能稱爲延展性。

sentences.english: Two important working properties of metals are ductility and malleability.
sentences.chinese: 延展性和可鍛性是金屬的兩種重要加工性能。

sentences.english: Strudels are usually made with high-gluten flour to increase the malleability of the dough.
sentences.chinese: 餡捲餅通常是用高筋麪粉，以增加麪糰的延展性。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
agglutinative (in linguistics, a characteristic of Altaic languages)
